mapper.sql: h.plan_id, h.tenant_id, h.plan_num, h.state, h.format, h.company_id, h.company_name, h.pr_category, h.pr_way, h.bid_method, h.demanders, h.creation_date_from, h.creation_date_to, h.pr_header_id, h.pr_num, h.line_num, h.pr_line_id, h.budget_account, h.bidding_mode, h.agent, h.project_amount, h.bid_amount, h.contract_amount, date_format( h.de_plan_fin_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS de_plan_fin_time, date_format( h.de_appr_fin_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS de_appr_fin_time, date_format( h.plan_fin_ven_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS plan_fin_ven_time, date_format( h.plan_fin_appr_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS plan_fin_appr_time, date_format( h.plan_fin_issue_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS plan_fin_issue_time, date_format( h.plan_fin_bid_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS plan_fin_bid_time, date_format( h.plan_fin_con_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS plan_fin_con_time, h.remarks, h.attachment, h.add_flag, h.operation, h.creation_date, h.created_by, h.last_updated_by, h.last_update_date, h.process_num, h.approval_status
mapper.select: select h.plan_id from scux_rcwl_plan_header h where h.pr_header_id = #{prHeaderId} and h.line_num = #{lineNum}
select count(1) from hpfm_company h where h.company_num = trim(#{companyNum})
select count(1) from smdm_budget_account h where h.budget_account_name = trim(#{budgetAccount}) and h.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
select count(1) from iam_user h where h.login_name = trim(#{demanders}) and h.organization_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT count( 1 ) FROM hpfm_purchase_agent h WHERE h.purchase_agent_code = trim(#{agent}) AND h.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
select h.company_name from hpfm_company h where h.company_num = trim(#{companyName})
select h.company_id from hpfm_company h where h.company_num = trim(#{companyName})
select h.budget_account_num from smdm_budget_account h where h.budget_account_name = trim(#{budgetAccount}) and h.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
select h.id from iam_user h where h.login_name = trim(#{demanders}) and h.organization_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT count(1) FROM scux_rcwl_plan_header h WHERE DATE_FORMAT( h.creation_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ), '%Y%m' ) and h.created_by = #{userId} and h.tenant_id = #{organizationId}

SELECT count(1) FROM scux_rcwl_plan_header h JOIN sprm_pr_line l ON h.pr_line_id = l.pr_line_id WHERE l.attribute_date4 IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT( l.attribute_date4, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ), '%Y%m' ) AND h.created_by = #{userId} AND h.tenant_id = #{organizationId}

SELECT count(1) FROM scux_rcwl_plan_header h JOIN sprm_pr_line l ON h.pr_line_id = l.pr_line_id WHERE l.attribute_date4 IS NOT NULL AND ( PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( now( ), '%Y%m' ), date_format( l.attribute_date4, '%Y%m' ) ) = 1 ) AND h.created_by = #{userId} AND h.tenant_id = #{organizationId}

SELECT ( @i := @i + 1 ) AS file_number, h.file_name, h.file_size, h.file_name AS description, h.file_url AS url FROM ( SELECT @i := 0 ) AS i, hfle_file h WHERE 1=1 and h.attachment_uuid in
#{uuId}

SELECT b.* FROM sinv_rcv_trx_header a, sinv_rcv_trx_line b, sodr_po_header sph, sodr_po_line spl, sodr_po_line_location spll WHERE a.rcv_trx_header_id = b.rcv_trx_header_id AND b.from_po_line_id = spl.po_line_id AND sph.po_header_id = spl.po_header_id AND spl.po_line_id = spll.po_line_id AND b.from_po_line_location_id = spll.po_line_location_id AND b.from_rcv_trx_line_id IS NULL AND b.tax_included_amount != spl.tax_included_line_amount AND b.from_asn_header_id IS NULL -- AND spll.strategy_header_id IN (10009) AND spll.strategy_header_id IN (4,5)

SELECT pl.tax_included_line_amount tax_included_amount, round(( pl.tax_included_line_amount / a.tax_included_price ), 6 ) quantity, round( sum( b.tax_included_amount ), 2 ) occupied_tax_amount, round( sum( b.quantity ), 6 ) occupied_quantity FROM sinv_rcv_trx_line a, sodr_po_line pl, sinv_rcv_trx_line b WHERE a.from_po_line_id = pl.po_line_id AND a.rcv_trx_line_id = b.from_rcv_trx_line_id AND a.rcv_trx_line_id = #{rcvTrxLineId}
